thread.title: Celebrities Read Mean Tweets at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Celebrities Read Mean Tweets at the Oscars

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Celebrities Read Mean Tweets at the Oscars
text:
Jimmy Kimmel brought one of his beloved talkshow gags to the Academy Awards. At tonight's ceremony, the host held a special Oscars edition of mean tweets, starring celebrities from Ryan Gosling to Samuel L. Jackson. Scroll down below for the best moments, and for the full clip. Natalie Portman read some comments about her baby bump.
Natalie reading Mean Tweets at The #Oscars ðŸ’« pic.twitter.com/YEji9Anf0z
